CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 27, 1957, pg. 2 reads: "Deplorable! - This foul smelling "toilet" for the 15 members of the two families in the top-floor apartments at 3404 Ruthvan St., is the open end of a sewage pipe (arrow), because the commode here and the one in the three-room apartment of the family of Mrs. Rosalee Brock (right) have been disconnected for quite some time, tenants said. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Interior with broken looking into bathroom with missing toilet in apartment at 3404 Ruthvan Street, Lawrenceville
